name: Little Arrow Shooter - Free Archery Shooting Games
name_original: Little Arrow Shooter - Free Archery Shooting Games
description:
One of the Most addictive Archery game on Appstore!

Do you like rushing games?
In Little arrow shooter, You are an Archers Hero and have to join in the fight with aborigines and defeat the enemies. Touching the Screen, adjusting your weapon and then, killing your enemies. Be careful! Any wrong step, you will die Think you are up for this challenge?

Features:
* Beautiful Stunning 3 Dimensional Graphics
* Smooth And Easy Game Play
* Environments That Keeps Changing
* Real Life Animations And Physics
